PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-05952021-06-17TC,  ,  ,  , 
ActAeronautics Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canadian Aviation Regulations (Safety Belts)
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADIAN AVIATION REGULATIONS (SAFETY BELTS) in order to explicitly state that in order for a safety belt to be considered fastened, the lap strap and any installed shoulder harness must also be fastened.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0153 Publication Date: 2021-07-07
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Canadian Aviation Regulations (Safety Belts)
precis: Regulations Amending the CANADIAN AVIATION REGULATIONS (SAFETY BELTS) in order to explicitly state that in order for a safety belt to be considered fastened, the lap strap and any installed shoulder harness must also be fastened.
